ygData.subject: RE: Race Wars Server
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree 100% with you way of thinking. Mistre ... From: Mitzi [mailto:mitzi@apex.net] Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 11:58 AM To: EQ_women@onelist.com Subject:
ygData.messageBody:
I agree 100% with you way of thinking.

Mistre

-----Original Message-----
From: Mitzi [mailto:mitzi@...]
Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 11:58 AM
To: EQ_women@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_women] Race Wars Server


From: "Mitzi" <mitzi@...>

Had to speak up on this one.. I call test my home.. I've always played there
and love helping out, making a new character to test whatever it is they are
requesting at the time.. giving feedback on new things.. that's what we're
there for.. but I totally disagree with what they have done to our server..
We have all had to kind of look over the races and work together.. teams may
consist of one for every race just because that's who's on.. it's the person
behind the character and not the race of character that's important to me..
I have many different races of characters myself.. so does that mean I'd go
to war against myself? no.. so all these new people have flocked to our
server and wrecked havoc.. they won't just let us play the game with all of
the (what I feel is) childish pranks.. bothering everyone.. it's totally
unfair the way they can do things to get you killed.. for instance, I had my
lvl 8 human cleric in Blackburrow, killing gnolls.. too many got on me at
once so I was heading toward zone (calling out a shout to warn others, of
course) then when I was just before zone I turned to try and kill at least
one.. there was an elf standing there and just as I was gonna zone he snared
me.. then just stood there and laughed out loud about it.. I gave him a few
choice words and got down to about 10 or so health when I finally broke free
and was able to zone.. he could have come up behind me and finished me off
with one hit and then looted my body of all coins and what ever one item he
wanted (they have turned this off right now on test but I'm speaking as if
it was on the race war server).. now how is that a fair fight? you have to
watch your back every single time you hunt or move? who gets enjoyment out
of that? I don't.. and I hope that those that do please move on to the race
war server when it goes live.. Oh btw he zoned with me and healed me after
we zoned.. then profusely apologized for what he'd done, saying he hadn't
even attempted anything to another race and saw that "opportunity" and
couldn't pass it up.. heh.. I know test is just what it says, test.. but to
force this kind of thing on the people that have done nothing but helped you
out isn't the way to go.. they could have just opened the race war server
and let those that were into that sort of thing go there and test away!
It's an ever changing game anyway.. after all is said and done and these
other people move on to it, I just hope my friends come back to their
regular characters (who they put on a week vacation because of this) and we
can get on with what we've been doing before.. my 4-5 copper worth, sorry
for the ramble.. there are many more examples of what they have done that
is totally crazy but I won't go into them all..

Mitzi
